meanings.sent1: The overcomplicated instructions confused the students.
meanings.sent2: The overcomplicated puzzle took hours to solve.
meanings.sent3: The overcomplicated recipe called for too many ingredients.
meanings.sent5: The overcomplicated machinery was difficult to repair.

meanings.definition: To make something more complicated than necessary.
meanings.sent1: She tends to overcomplicate simple tasks.
meanings.sent2: Don't overcomplicate the process with unnecessary steps.
meanings.sent3: He always manages to overcomplicate things with his ideas.
meanings.sent4: Trying to overcomplicate the project only led to delays.
meanings.sent5: It's best not to overcomplicate matters and keep it simple.
